name: The Beast of Bleakridge
description:
You're driving home on a winter's night, when your car breaks down. As a result, you find yourself in a strange town called Bleakridge, where all the citizens are having the same mysterious dream. Additionally, many townspeople are reporting 'werewolf' sightings. As a private detective, it’s your job to restore the hope of the victims, and find evidence supporting these strange claims. Can you uncover the mystery in time? Or will your soul, too, become the property of the beast of Bleakridge?

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, J is A, K is B, shift is select and enter is start.

All assets (with the exception of the character sprites) are made by me!

Credits:

All sprites are creating using 2BitCharacterGenerator (https://0x72.itch.io/2bitcharactergenerator).

Title/Inventory font based off of Alagard Font (https://www.dafont.com/alagard.font).

Special thanks to GrumpyFunction (https://gumpyfunction.itch.io/game-boy-rpg-fantasy-tileset-free),  Jan Schneider (https://jan-schneider.itch.io),  and Kenny Assets ( https://www.kenney.nl/assets) Bit and Bots tileset (couldn't track down the creator). While I did make all the assets myself, these creators gave me a lot of help, and I pulled some inspiration from their designs!

Story and attached characters are based off of H.P Lovecraft's complied works.
